title: Aspirin Data
description:
Description
Efficacy of Aspirin in preventing death after a myocardial infarct.
reference:
The data were collected for a meta-analysis
of the effectiveness of Aspirin (versus placebo) in preventing 
death after a myocardial infarction.

parameters.ta: total number of subjects treated with Aspirin.
parameters.tp: total number subjects treated with placebo.

format: A data frame with 7 observations on the following 4 variables.
